alert.note: Alert for Imperial (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 19 at 7:41AM PDT until August 19 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PDT THIS MORNING FOR SOUTHWESTERN IMPERIAL COUNTY... At 741 AM PDT, emergency management reported thunderstorms produced heavy rain along Highway 98, west of Imperial. The highway has been closed. Between 1.5 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Emergency management reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Ocotillo and Coyote Wells. This includes the following streams and drainages... Palm Canyon Wash, Gert Wash, Myer Creek, Carrizo Wash and Fish Creek Wash. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
